# Le forme


Al momento, sono disponibili le seguenti forme:

:::{}


```{r echo = F, fig.cap="triangle",fig.topcaption=TRUE} 
Canvas(15, 15)
DrawRegPolygon(radius.x = triangle()$size.x, 
               radius.y = triangle()$size.y, 
               lwd = triangle()$lwd, 
               lty = triangle()$lty, nv = triangle()$nv, rot = triangle()$rotation)


```
